Kent,

Please leave JUnit under the CPL. We need something to keep Oracle's=
 aggressiveness in check. 

On an unrelated note, Google uses and extends J=
Unit to test the Dalvik VM. Oracle might have already triggered the CPL pat=
ent clauses (which may explain in great part why they are focussing on this=
 right now.). A lawyer should look into it.

Fred
Former Staff Engineer, SW=
 at Sun Microsystem

On Jan 17, 2011, at 8:42 AM, Kent Beck wrote:

> Bill,=

> 
> I can understand why Oracle lawyers object to the patent provisions o=
f the CPL. It makes sense to me to work out a business arrangement to addre=
ss the JUnit license to their satisfaction.
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Kent
> 
>
